game.name: Star Squadrons: Galactic Trading Card Game
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어
game.shortDescription: A fast, tactical sci-fi Trading Card Game — playable digitally and as a physical TCG. No mana, hidden card placement, dynamic location-control, monthly rotating battlefields, global rankings, physical Play-2-Claim rewards — with a 2026 Kickstarter launch. Built in Unreal Engine 5.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast, tactical sci-fi Trading Card Game — playable digitally and as a physical TCG. No mana, hidden card placement, dynamic location-control, monthly rotating battlefields, global rankings, physical Play-2-Claim rewards — with a 2026 Kickstarter launch. Built in Unreal Engine 5.
